snippet: Unfettered optimism was the unofficial religion of the United States in the early 20th century, but the photographer Lewis Hine declined to buy in.
lead_paragraph: Unfettered optimism was the unofficial religion of the United States in the early 20th century, but the photographer Lewis Hine declined to buy in.

headline.main: Captured in Time: A Certain New York
